creator: carenas@chasqui.lared.net.pe
text:
From 1.3 ab, the code has been changed to have a better granularity and the 
time reported is on uS with the APR constant APR_USEC_PER_SEC used to get the 
real elapsed time on seconds.

sadly ab reports on "ms" and therefore the printed number on seconds doesn't 
match the real time measured.

the easiest solution is to multiply the expression used times 1000 on 
both "Time per request" printings

creator: carenas@chasqui.lared.net.pe
text:
Created attachment 1713
an explicative diff of the solution

creator: carenas@chasqui.lared.net.pe
text:
Created attachment 1720
a context diff patch (finally)

creator: rederpj@apache.org
text:
A fix has been committed to correct this which will be included in a future
release. Please see revision 1.100 of the file ab.c. Thank you for your submission.
